Check out my github repo for installation
The package now is compacted using
, so now we need some "special" extractor. So, in my case, I've downloaded this
Extract the content to your git bash installation dir:
language-bash shiki shiki-themes one-dark-pro one-dark-pro one-light
So, this step is important, it seems
will ask a few configurations, like the tab completion, history, etc. Please read the options and set that according to your use.
Installing oh-my-zsh, execute the following cmd on git bash
file. (create it if it doesn't exist)
Add the following lines at the end of the file

# Launch Zsh
if [ -t 1 ]; then
exec zsh
fi
Close and open again the git bash.

Hng dn ci t C++ cho Sublime Text trn Windows
Tng hp phm tt trong Sublime Text, VSCode
v mun s dng nhng phm tt ny:
: Dch chuyn dng/vng chn ln 1 dng
: Dch chuyn dng/vng chn xung 1 dng
: Chn dng hin ti, tip tc nhn Ctrl + L  chn dng tip theo
: Chn mt t, tip tc nhn Ctrl + D  chn nhng t ging vy
: Nhn i dng/vng chn hin ti
: i ti du ng ngoc / m ngoc gn nht
: Chn ton b ni dung trong du ngoc
: Li dng hin ti vo trong 1 tab
: Li dng hin ti ra ngoi 1 tab
: Comment / Un-comment dng / vng chn hin ti ("// ")
: ng / M ton b dng / vng chn hin ti ("/* */")
: Tm trong cc file ang m
: Di chuyn qua li gia cc tab
: Chia mn hnh thnh grid gm 4 groups
: Chuyn vng chn sang ch in hoa
: Chuyn vng chn sang ch thng
